title: Transfer news: Manchester United 'set to make another move' for Benfica defender Ruben Dias
text:
Manchester United are reportedly poised to return to the transfer market for Benfica defender Ruben Dias.

But Ole Gunnar Solskjaer may have to splurge up to £80million to prise the 22-year-old away from the Portuguese capital, according to The Sun.

They made moves for the Portugal international in the summer but missed out.

Manchester United are reportedly poised to return to the transfer market for Ruben Dias

Now with Benfica set to offer the centre-back improved terms, his release clause will rise dramatically from £60m.

Benfica are desperate to keep hold of their star man and are believed to be willing to pay him big money in a new deal.

But the lure of Manchester United could prove tough to resist for the player.

Dias made 85 appearances in his first two seasons after graduating from the B team, and has earned 13 caps since making his senior international debut last year.
description: Manchester United are reportedly poised to return to the transfer market for Benfica defender Ruben Dias, but face having to splurge up to £80m to prise him away from the Portuguese capital.
